__e: My watch stopped, all the clocks in the house are wrong, and I don't know where my phone is.
But they are wrong and they are not here and with certainty they don't know what I know
They say she's dead, but I know they're wrong, and so do you.
If they're right about who you are, what would make them think they'd be wrong about what you do?
Every day I would tell them how wrong they were about you... because you seemed like a good man. May-Maybe a man trapped in a loveless marriage.
But if a man is wrong about himself and others are wrong about him who is left to say what he really is?
And I know one thing about me-- I may pick the wrong guys, but when I hear another woman is involved,
Now, I think they're wrong but if I'm going to help you then you have to give me the truth.
It's hard to admit when we're wrong, that even though everything looks fine, there is a problem.
Now, didn't you ever hear... two wrongs just don't make a right?
Okay, but just because they're wrong does not mean my fault.
I mean, sure, they can't all be right, but they can't all be wrong, right?
